nodes.text: The Gauntlet of Crassus was a left-handed gauntlet created and owned by the Sith Lord known as Crassus. When worn, the gauntlet not only bolstered the strength of the wearer's physical grip, but also provided a tenfold increase in the potency of their telekinetic abilities. The gauntlet was buried within the tomb of its creator, located in the Valley of the Dark Lords on the planet Korriban.
